description:
Drive Angry 3D (2011)

   104 min  -  Action | Fantasy | Thriller   -  24 February 2011 (Netherlands)

A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

 Writers: 
Todd Farmer, Patrick Lussier
 
Stars:
 Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard and William Fichtner 

Storyline
